qas.question: Which company makes timepieces in Midtown?
What is the largest employer in Detroit?
What district is Midtown north of?
Other than Downtown and Midtown, what area boasts a fast growing restaurant scene?

context: Thousands more employees work in Midtown, north of the <a2_0>central business district<a2_0/>. Midtown's anchors are the city's largest single employer <a1_0>Detroit Medical Center<a1_0/>, Wayne State University, and the Henry Ford Health System in New Center. Midtown is also home to watchmaker <a0_0>Shinola<a0_0/> and an array of small and/or startup companies. <a4_0>New Center<a4_0/> bases TechTown, a research and business incubator hub that’s part of the WSU system. Like downtown and <a3_0>Corktown<a3_0/>, Midtown also has a fast-growing retailing and restaurant scene.
